DOC.brief_summary: The objective study assess effect diet different protein composition ( 20 % , 27 % 35 % ) , mainly come animal protein lean red meat , body weight lipid profile overweight obese woman . A dietary intervention carry 3 month 90 woman individually randomize hypocaloric diet three type macronutrient composition : 1 ) 35 % protein , 30 % fat 35 % carbohydrate ; 2 ) 27 % protein , 30 % fat 43 % carbohydrates 3 ) 20 % protein , 30 % fat 50 % carbohydrate . Around 50 % total proteins diet come lean red meat ( leg shoulder lamb ) provide 15 different recipe participant use part diet . At begin study , 6 week end intervention , follow parameter determine : anthropometric ( weight , waist circumference , body mass index body composition ) , blood pressure , dietary ( 72-hours dietary registry ) exercise assessment biochemical analysis ( total cholesterol , triglyceride , HDL cholesterol , LDL cholesterol , apolipoprotein A1 , apolipoprotein B , iron , transferrin , ferritin , uric acid , glucose , HbA1c , insulin adipokines ) . In 3-months visit , participant advise follow prescribed diet next 3 month . Monitoring visit nutritionist perform . A follow-up visit do 3-months end intervention ( 6-months beginning study ) ass long-time efficacy main endpoint diet . In visit anthropometric parameter ( weight , waist circumference , body mass index body composition ) determine .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Effect Diets With Different Protein Composition - Mainly Coming From Lean Red Meat - Body Weight Lipid Profile Overweight Obese Women
DOC.criteria: Age : 1880 year old . Body mass index 27.5 40 . Steady weight last 3 month ( Â±3 kg ) . Informed consent provide . Presence uncontrolled endocrinological pathology ( include hypothyroidism ) . Type 2 diabetes mellitus bad metabolic control ( HbA1c > 8 % ) . Lipidlowering drug last 3 month . Intake functional food plant sterol past 6 week . Vitamin supplement intake . Hormone replacement therapy . Consumption Orlistat last 2 month High intake alcohol ( > 30 gr./day ) . Any serious disease involve less 1 year life expectancy , investigator judgment , limit followup homogeneous diet throughout study . Pregnancy intention pregnancy study .
